New Records: Vangelis Pavlidis scored a brace, marking Greece's first win over England
Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored twice, including the winning goal in stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley hoped for a permanent role after the match
England started with an attacking lineup including Cole Palmer
Post-Match Reflections: John Stones expressed disappointment with the result
Vangelis Pavlidis reflected on the win and mentioned George Baldock
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greece's win was their first in 116 years
79,012 fans attended the match at Wembley Stadium
